name: PIXEL ZUMBI
description: Destroy the evil being that entered the Earth's atmosphere, causing an apocalypse.
minimum_requirements: OS: Microsoft Windows 2000 or higher Processor: 1.60GHz or higher Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 256MB or higher Storage: 210 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 2000 or higher Processor: Phisic Quadcore Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 2 GB    256bits Storage: 210 MB available space
